sense.def:
To appeal for something
pomeni, da resno in nujno zahtevamo nekaj, kar potrebujemo.

seg.quote: He was appealing for funds to build a new school.

sense.def:
An appeal
je resna in nujna prošnja.

seg.quote: A radio appeal asking for money for cancer research, raised £75,000.

sense.def:
To appeal to someone's reason or feelings
pomeni nekomu predlagati, naj stori tisto, za kar ga prosimo, če hoče dajati vtis, da je razumen ali sočuten.

seg.quote: They are confident they can appeal to her sense of duty.

sense.def:
To appeal to someone
na visokem položaju proti neki odločitvi pomeni uradno prositi za njeno spremembo.

An appeal
je uradna zahteva po spremembi odločitve.

seg.quote: The Supreme Court turned down our appeal.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
appeals to someone
je tisto zanj privlačno ali zanimivo.

seg.quote: She had an appealing sense of humour.

sense.def:
The appeal of something
je lastnost nekega predmeta, ki je za ljudi privlačna ali zanimiva.
